ValueReceiver - Class in vsync
The ValueReceiver is used to synchronize values from an Arduino to the Processing sketch.
ValueReceiver(PApplet, Serial) - Constructor for class vsync.ValueReceiver
Creates a new instance of ValueReceiver using a given Serial interface.
ValueSender - Class in vsync
The ValueSender is used to synchronize values from the Processing sketch to the Arduino.
ValueSender(PApplet, Serial) - Constructor for class vsync.ValueSender
Creates a new instance of a ValueSender using a given Serial interface.
variableChanged(int) - Method in class vsync.ValueSender
Checks if a variable changed since the last sync.
VERSION - Static variable in class vsync.ValueReceiver
 
version() - Static method in class vsync.ValueReceiver
return the version of the library.
vsync - package vsync
 
VSyncConstants - Interface in vsync
An interface to store the constants (special characters of the protocol)
